Mahamadou Amadou Sabo (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba n'etiti na otu egwuregwu bu Club Africain
A kpọrọ ya na mbụ na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger na Nọvemba 2019, mana ọ nọgidere na oche
O gbara egwuregwu nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu ahụ na 5 June 2021 na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Gambia Na June 2022, Sabo gbara goolu ọzọ n'oge 1 na 1 tie na Uganda.
Àtụ:Updated Scores and results list Niger's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Sabo goal.
